panel_embed.title: 🎫 Support Tickets
panel_embed.description:
Need help? Click the button below to create a support ticket!

**What happens next?**
✅ A private channel will be created
✅ Staff will be notified
✅ We'll help resolve your issue

footer.text: Support Team • Click below to get started

welcome_embed.title: 🎫 Ticket Created
welcome_embed.description:
Welcome {user}! Thank you for creating a ticket.

**Please provide the following information:**
• Your in-game tag
• Detailed description of your issue
• Any relevant screenshots

A staff member will assist you shortly!
